      • insertData

        public boolean insertData(java.lang.Integer sender_id,
                          java.lang.Integer recievr_id,
                          java.lang.String stream_id,
                          java.lang.String message,
                          java.lang.Integer message_id,
                          java.lang.String message_type,
                          java.lang.String file_name,
                          java.lang.String date_time,
                          java.lang.String message_time,
                          java.lang.Integer isnew,
                          java.lang.Integer isdownloaded)
        Insert data in local database
        Parameters:
        sender_id - Person who sends the message
        recievr_id - Person who recieve the message
        stream_id - stream_id
        message - message
        message_id - message or file id
        message_type - message_type text,image,document,audio
        file_name - filename
        date_time - date and time when the message is sent
        message_time - message receive time
        isnew - is set to 1 until the message is read by the user
        isdownloaded - is set to 1 until the file is downloade by the user
        Returns:

      • getmessage

      • updatestream

        public void updatestream(java.lang.String stream_title,
                         java.lang.String stream_users,
                         java.lang.String user_id,
                         java.lang.Integer block_userid,
                         java.lang.Integer is_blocked)
        Update user stream locally
        Parameters:
        stream_title - stream title if its a group chat
        stream_users - users in the stream
        user_id - user own id
        block_userid - another user id
        is_blocked - stores boolean value either he is blocked or not
